answers.answer: OK maybe it is a question for a name lol

Congrats!  We are naming our son Cohen. I fell in love with it because it isn't too common, but it isn't completely out there. Lol
Our son will be John william

question: Joined team blue and boy names are hard to pick I had three names but I don't want to use them now.  So am stuck for names.  Something unique and not common. Now due January 20 not the 24. And all my blood tests came back I don't have overactive thyroid and so far no preeclampsia. And finally gained 3 pounds. Everything is going great. Lol my daughter on the other hand wants a sister not a brother.  But that will change hopefully because  she originally wanted a brother anyway. Just so excited. Can't post it anywhere else but here because I don't want to Facebook anything till after the baby is born.
title: so excited it's not a question
